content.rendered:
Directed by Anand Tiwari

Written by Asif Ali Beg. Anand Tiwari. Sumeet Vyas. Sumeet Vyas

Cast Vicky Kaushal (Sanjay Chaturvedi). Angira Dhar (Karina D’Souza). Alankrita Sahai (Rashi Khurana). Raghuvir Yadav (Bhaskar Chaturvedi (as Raghubir Yadav)). Ratna Pathak Shah (Blossom D’Souza). Supriya Pathak (Lata Chaturvedi (as Supriya Pathak Kapur)). Brijendra Kala (T.C. Mishra). Rekha Bhardwaj (Classical Singer). Kunaal Roy Kapur (Samuel Misquitta). Arunoday Singh (Kashin Malhotra). Manyuu Doshi (Sunny (as Deepal Doshi)). Raviza Chauhan (Tina). Ranbir Kapoor (Gattu (Cameo with Special Thanks)). Asif Ali Beg (Father Lawrie). Kamal Mishra (Gajju Mama). Gopal Datt (Pappu Pandit- Sanjay’s Maama). Ivan Rodrigues (Noel Misquita). Annabelle Ferro (Annabelle Misquitta (as Annabelle Ferro Desylva)). Ritika Bedi (Pregnant Woman). Uttam Halder (Pick Pocket). Ayesha Raza Mishra (Poonam Tiwari). Lynn D’Lima (Aunt Clarissa). Rebecca Alvares (Candice). Amritpal Singh Bindra (Mean Office HOD). Lara Chandni (Mean Office HOD). Manoshi Nath (Mean Office HOD). Amir Sheikh (Billu). Vineet Verma (Waiter). Anup Ingale (Office Staff-1). Ashraf-Uddin Ahmed (Office Staff-2). Poorna Anand (Peon). Neville Irani (Wedding MC). Abhishek Sharma (Dream House Husband). Hrishitaa Sharma (Dream House Wife). Rajesh Rao (Security Guard). Anurag Chaturvedi (Gotya). Sanjeev Sen (Tabla Player). Dilshat Khan (Sarangi Player). Bijesh Khawas (Biji). Dipen Oja (Ramesh Driver) . Ashraf Farooqi (Office employee). Vishal Parekh (Vishal). Gajraj Rao (Mr. Rehmat)

Languages Hindi

Producers Amritpal Singh Bindra. Pashan Jal. Salona Bains Joshi. Sonia Kanwar. Ankur Khanna. Dimple Mathias. Sikandar Rana. Ronnie Screwvala. Shubh Shivdasani

Production RSV. Still and Still Moving Picture
